author: kevaundray
content:
I guess want you want initially in the bindings is something like:

```
// Point methods
point_add(left : &Point, right : &Point, result : &mut Point)
point_double(x : &Point, result : &mut Point)
multi_scalar_mul(scalars : &[Field], points : &[Point], result : &mut Point)

// Scalar Methods
field_add(left : Scalar, right : &Scalar, result : &mut Scalar)
field_sub(left : Scalar, right : &Scalar, result : &mut Scalar)
field_mul(left : Scalar, right : &Scalar, result : &mut Scalar)
field_inv(x : &Scalar, result : &mut Scalar)
field_neg(x : &Scalar, result : &mut Scalar)
```

Then you would mainly only need to implement the banderwagon and verkle trie cryptography
